headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid BAX and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Baxter has gotten torched over the last six months - since March 2025, its stock price has dropped 32% to $22.86 per share. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
